alert.note: Alert for Edwards; Ford; Kiowa (Kansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued July 20 at 7:06PM CDT until July 20 at 7:15PM CDT by NWS Dodge City
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 715 PM CDT FOR EAST CENTRAL FORD...NORTHWESTERN KIOWA AND SOUTHWESTERN EDWARDS COUNTIES... At 706 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located 7 miles north of Mullinville, moving east at 30 mph. THIS IS A DESTRUCTIVE STORM. HAZARD...80 mph wind gusts and nickel size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Flying debris will be dangerous to those caught without shelter. Mobile homes will be heavily damaged. Expect considerable damage to roofs, windows, and vehicles. Extensive tree damage and power outages are likely. Locations impacted include... Mullinville. THUNDERSTORM DAMAGE THREAT...DESTRUCTIVE HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...0.88 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...80 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
